title: I’m a Galloping Horse: Ginger
content: The four popular artistes,former Miss Sri Lanka and popular model Gayesha Perera, famous singer Ginger, Popular actress Ruwanthi Mangala and Malsha Kumaratunga, daughter of Minister Jeevan Kumaratunga who faced the Nomination Board of the SLFP recently  revealed in an interview with Daily Mirror why they decided to enter politics and what they would do if…
